coreAtributes.name: leather dress
coreAtributes.description: A stylish leather dress for an effortless kind of refinement.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the back of [npc.her] leather dress, letting it fall to [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the back of [npc2.namePos] leather dress, letting it fall to [npc2.her] feet.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the back of [npc2.namePos] leather dress, and [npc.verb(yank)] it down to [npc2.her] feet.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the leather dress up to [npc.her] chest, then [npc.verb(zip)] it closed.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the leather dress up to [npc2.namePos] chest, then [npc.verb(zip)] it closed.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the leather dress up to [npc2.namePos] chest, then [npc.verb(tug)] the zipper closed.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc.her] leather dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] leather dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] leather dress.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc.her] leather dress.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] leather dress.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] leather dress.
